network class¶

class network.ActionValueEstimator(learning_rate, num_input, scope='value_estimator')[source]¶

Bases: object

Action-value Function approximator. Given a representation of the environment, returns estimated values over the two actions of the state.

Parameters:
  • learning_rate (float) – Learning rate used by optimizer.
  • num_input (int) – Size of the state array, i.e. the input.
  • scope (str) – Variable scope name of the operations or variable name in the network. Default is value_estimator.
predict(state, sess=None)[source]¶

Get the estimated values of the two actions of the given state.

Parameters:
  • state (array) – Representations of the environement.
  • sess (Session) – Environment in which the operations are executed and objects are evaluated.
Returns:

Array consisting estimated values of the two actions.
update(state, target, action, sess=None)[source]¶

Run the optimizer and update the network given the targeted values.

Parameters:
  • state (array) – Representations of the environement.
  • target (array) – Targeted values the state-action pair.
  • action (array) – Actions that was selected in each state.
  • sess (Session) – Environment in which the operations are executed and objects are evaluated.
class network.StateValueEstimator(learning_rate, num_input, scope='value_estimator')[source]¶

Bases: object

State-value Function approximator. Given a representation of the environment, returns a estimated value of the state.

Parameters:
  • learning_rate (float) – Learning rate used by optimizer.
  • num_input (int) – Size of the state array, i.e. the input.
  • scope (str) – Variable scope name of the operations or variable name in the network. Default is value_estimator.
predict(state, sess=None)[source]¶

Get the estimated values of the given state.

Parameters:
  • state (array) – Representations of the environement.
  • sess (Session) – Environment in which the operations are executed and objects are evaluated.
Returns:

Estimated value of the given state.
update(state, target, sess=None)[source]¶

Run the optimizer and update the network given the targeted values.

Parameters:
  • state (array) – Representations of the environement.
  • target (array) – Targeted values the states.
  • sess (Session) – Environment in which the operations are executed and objects are evaluated.
class network.PolicyEstimator(learning_rate, num_input, scope='policy_estimator')[source]¶

Bases: object

Policy Function approximator. Given a representation of the environment, returns probabilities of taking the two actions of the state.

Parameters:
  • learning_rate (float) – Learning rate used by optimizer.
  • num_input (int) – Size of the state array, i.e. the input.
  • scope (str) – Variable scope name of the operations or variable name in the network. Default is policy_estimator.
predict(state, sess=None)[source]¶

Get the probabilities of taking the two actions of the given state.

Parameters:
  • state (array) – Representations of the environement.
  • sess (Session) – Environment in which the operations are executed and objects are evaluated.
Returns:

Array consisting probabilities of the two actions.
update(state, target, action, sess=None)[source]¶

Run the optimizer and update the network given the targeted values.

Parameters:
  • state (array) – Representations of the environement.
  • target (array) – Targeted values the selected actions.
  • action (array) – Actions that was selected in each state.
  • sess (Session) – Environment in which the operations are executed and objects are evaluated.
